longBusinessSummary: Sumitomo Bakelite Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of semiconductor materials and plastic products in Japan and internationally. The company offers epoxy resin molding compounds for encapsulation of semiconductor devices, photosensitive coating resins for semiconductor wafers, liquid resins for semiconductor devices, substrate materials for semiconductor packages; and high performance plastic products, such as phenolic molding compounds, resins for industrial use, and resin copper-clad laminates, molded parts, synthetic resin adhesives, epoxy resin copper-clad laminates, and aircraft interior components. The company also provides vinyl resin and multilayer sheets, freshness preserving films, melamine resin decorative laminates and sheets, polycarbonate and PVC resin plates, and biotechnology related products, as well as engages in the design and contracting of waterproofing work. In addition, it offers packaging products for producers and vegetable factories and freshness keeping zipper bags for household use; halogen-free, flame retardant, and heat resistant sheets and aluminum based decorative laminates; and medical devices, such as endoscopic device, surgery/drainage, and circulation/IVR. Further, the company provides healthcare products, which include low protein adsorption products and ELISA, glycan analysis, and three-dimensional cell culture; polymer waveguide with micro-mirror; and waterproofing products. It serves automotive/railways/aircraft, electrical and electronic equipment, construction/residence, industrial material, medical institution/laboratory, bio, agriculture, and functional packaging sectors, as well as interior decoration for stores. Sumitomo Bakelite Company Limited was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
